text: dang thi rea di sng rx sul phu hnung cak phwk cea xeng ma nı hmu phwk cea sung khea ca xan brrda xongkar khxng rea hı phwk cea fang læa ca thahı phwk cea sxad brisuththi læa ca sxn khamphir læa khwam ru keiyw kab khx ptibati hı kæ phwk cea læa ca sxn phwk cea nı sing thi phwk cea mi khey ru ma kxn
